text: Yithi: “Ingaba kuloo mahlulelane enu (nithi ngaka-Allâh) likhona elikhokelela enyanisweni?” Yithi: “NguAllâh Okhokelela enyanisweni. Ingaba Ofanelwe kukunqulwa ngulowo ukhokelela enyanisweni na nokuba ngulowo ungafumani siKhokelo ngaphandle kokokuba yena akhokelwe? Kanti kwenzeka ntoni na kuni? Nigweba kanjani na?”
